subject: Basketball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The W.N.B.A. suspended the Detroit assistant Rick Mahorn and 10 players for their roles in an on-court skirmish between the Shock and the Los Angeles Sparks.
snippet: The W.N.B.A. suspended the Detroit assistant Rick Mahorn and 10 players for their roles in an on-court skirmish between the Shock and the Los Angeles Sparks.
